resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73767</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-cd88-4239-2cb1-9104d2e415ba#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Oxus-kincslelet.</string>
            <string language="en">Oxus-treasure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oxus-Schatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oxus-trésor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oxus-tesouro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oxus-tesoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οξuς-θησαυρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oxus-tesoro</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">4 ló által vontatott aranykocsi, griffes karperec.</string>
            <string language="en">A golden wagon towed by four horse, bracelet with Griffins</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr.e. 550-400.,  Oxus-kincslelet,  perzsa,  aranylelet,  szárnyas griff,  aranykocsi,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, 550-400 BC, Oxus-treasure, Persian, golden treasure, winged griffin, golden wagon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein goldener Lastwagen geschleppt durch vier 
Pferd, Bracelet mit Greifen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un chariot d'or remorqué par quatre cheval, 
bracelet avec des griffons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um vagão dourado rebocado por quatro cavalo, 
bracelet com griffins</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un vagone dorato rimorchiato da quattro cavallo, 
bracelet con i griffins</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα χρυσό βαγόνι εμπορευμάτων που ρυμουλκείται από 
τέσσερα το άλογο, βραχιόλι με Griffins</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un carro de oro remolcado por cuatro caballo, 
pulsera con los griffins</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, 550-400 BC, Oxus-Schatz, 
Perser, goldener Schatz, winged Greif, goldener Lastwagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, 550-400 BC, Oxus-trésor, Persan, 
trésor d'or, griffon à ailes, chariot d'or</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, 550-400 BC, Oxus-tesouro, persa, 
tesouro dourado, griffin voado, vagão dourado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, 550-400 BC, Oxus-tesoro, persiano, 
tesoro dorato, griffin alato, vagone dorato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, 550-400 Π.Χ., οξuς-θησαυρός, περσικός, 
χρυσός θησαυρός, φτερωτό griffin, χρυσό βαγόνι εμπορευμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, 550-400 A.C., Oxus-tesoro, persa, 
tesoro de oro, griffin con alas, carro de oro</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
